body: Specifying a complex structure for this data was a terrible mistake and has caused a lot of [problems](https://www.imperialviolet.org/2014/09/26/pkcs1.html). We're doing pretty well expunging that mistake. Chrome (entirely), Android (in many places) and Google services implement RSA checking in the same fashion as Go. I don't wish to add complexity to this sensitive area of code I'm afraid.
